Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Medical District
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Medical District due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Medical District due to a mechanical problem on the train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
